TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit AttachablePropertyServices extends System.Object
public ref class AttachablePropertyServices abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供靜態 Helper 方法，這些方法會從可附加屬性中取得值和存取子方法資訊，並使用附加的屬性存放區。

span.span: Provides static helper methods that obtain values and accessor method information from an attachable property and that work with an attached property store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別中的大部分功能依賴附加的屬性存放區，它通常會實作介面。Most functionality in this class relies on an attached property store, which generally implements the interface. 不過，傳遞到存放區的參數不具類型與介面，並改為的型別為`object`。However, parameters for passing the store into are not typed as the interface and are instead typed as `object`. 這是因為您可以傳遞任意的物件，然後在此情況下，使用內部預設可附加屬性存放區。This is because you can pass an arbitrary object, and in this case, an internal default attachable property store is used. 任意物件的最佳作法是將會與存放區相關聯的物件。Best practice for the arbitrary object is to pass the object that would otherwise be associated with the store. 未通過`null`表示，您不需要使用。Do not pass `null` to indicate that you do not have an to use. 傳遞`null`進入程式碼路徑，不執行任何動作。Passing `null` enters code paths that do nothing. 將物件傳遞的是不是 null，但評估為`null`上嘗試轉型時，會使用預設可附加屬性存放區。Passing an object that is non-null, but evaluates as `null` on an attempted cast, uses the default attachable property store.

summary.span: 從指定的可附加屬性存放區，將所有可附加的屬性值組複製到目的陣列中。

span.span: Copies all attachable property/value pairs from a specified attachable property store and into a destination array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基礎呼叫這個方法會叫用實作受限於與索引鍵/值組，這可能不會列出本主題中的例外狀況的來源。Calling this method invokes an underlying implementation that is constrained with a key/value pair, which might be the source of exceptions that are not listed in this topic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 商店則是每個執行個體;因此，在存放區，`name`值應該是模稜兩可。Stores are per instance; therefore, in a store, the `name` value should be unambiguous.
